title: Triangle
content: A triangle is a set of 3 pairwise adjacent vertices in G.

title: Hits Triangle
content: An edge set S hits a triangle if it contains at least one edge of that triangle.

title: Triangle Edge Cover
content: An edge set that hits every triangle in the graph.

title: τ₁(G)
content: Minimum size of a triangle edge cover. Central to the conjecture.

title: Triangle-Sparse
content: An edge set containing at most one edge from each triangle.

title: α₁(G)
content: Maximum size of a triangle-sparse edge set. Central to the conjecture.

title: τ_B(G)
content: Minimum edges to remove to make G bipartite. Key to Norin-Sun proof.

title: τ₁ ≤ τ_B
content: Making G bipartite hits all triangles. Crucial inequality.

title: EGT Conjecture
content: The original conjecture: α₁(G) + τ₁(G) ≤ n²/4.

title: Norin-Sun 2016
content: The stronger result: α₁(G) + τ_B(G) ≤ n²/4. Resolves the conjecture.

title: K_n Equality
content: Complete graphs achieve equality in the bound.

title: K_{m,m}+vertex Equality
content: K_{m,m} plus one universal vertex achieves equality.

title: Mantel's Theorem
content: Triangle-free graphs have ≤ n²/4 edges. Classical result.

title: Problem #23 Conjecture
content: The related conjecture that τ_B(G) ≤ n²/25.
